channel.title: Need Help - Runserver.sh
channel.description:
Dear Moparscape Users I just purchased a dedicated server & its running Linux. I need a file called Runserver.sh to run the server on linux. I dont need compile as i can just compile it on the PC I have.
You'll recieve full adminstrator privelages on the server & if You can code or help You'll get administrator on the server forums soon to be up - I have the domain ready.

item.title: Need Help - Runserver.sh
item.dc:creator: @gh0styscape gh0styscape
item.description:
@gh0styscape wrote:

I dont understand what you both mean. Can someone just post the .SH file or the things im suppost to put in the .sh file.

Thanks

Read full topic

item.description:

right so u beed a runeserver.bat

  • easy download any server and use from there

item.title: Need Help - Runserver.sh
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

You probably would need to do something similar like on Windows:

java server

Then just use:

./runserver.sh

If you can’t run the script, then you will need to chmod it:

chmod a+x runserver.sh

Read full topic
